column4: Hi Peeps, i just installed ubuntu on my alienware m11x, but there seems to be a problem with the graphics driver. There is two graphicscard in the machine, one for gaming, and one for long time use. The battery is only showing 3 hours (where it runs 7 in windows) How can i solve this?
does it work 7 hours in windows ?
in windows there was a possbility to switch between the gaphiccards, to save power.
